About

CipherTrace mobile app is designed to trace and investigate virtual asset addresses and blockchain transactions while in the field. The app shows cryptocurrency address balances, risk scores, and even locations. It allows investigators to share cases, risky addresses, and suspicious transactions with analysts at headquarters for additional research and monitoring.
